title: Raymond Durand (driver)
text: Raymond Durand (born 8 July 1952 in <a href="Gap%2C%20Hautes-Alpes">Gap, Hautes-Alpes</a>) is a French <a href="Rallying">rally</a> driver. He won the <a href="FIA%20Alternative%20Energies%20Cup">FIA Alternative Energies Cup</a> drivers' title with <a href="Toyota">Toyota</a> in <a href="2009%20FIA%20Alternative%20Energies%20Cup%20season">2009</a> (finishing first in the Rally of <a href="Montecarlo">Montecarlo</a> and in the <a href="Ecorally%20San%20Marino%20%E2%80%93%20Citt%C3%A0%20del%20Vaticano">Ecorally San Marino – Città del Vaticano</a>) and in <a href="2010%20FIA%20Alternative%20Energies%20Cup%20season">2010</a> (when he won in <a href="Zolder">Zolder</a> and <a href="Reykjav%C3%ADk">Reykjavík</a>).
